name: Chatpad
description: Recently, there has been a surge of UIs for ChatGPT, making it the new to-do app that everyone wants to try their hand at. Chatpad sets itself apart with a broader vision - to become the ultimate interface for ChatGPT users.
longDescription: Recently, there has been a surge of UIs for ChatGPT, making it the new to-do app that everyone wants to try their hand at. Chatpad sets itself apart with a broader vision - to become the ultimate interface for ChatGPT users.
